definitions.explanation_en: A stylized graphical representation of a smiling face, commonly used in digital communication to convey friendliness, happiness, or positivity.
definitions.example_en: She ended her text message with a yellow smiley to show she was joking.

definitions.explanation_en: A person who frequently smiles or has a cheerful, optimistic demeanor, often used informally or affectionately.
definitions.example_en: He's such a smileyâ€”always greeting everyone with a big grin.
